verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:12
verses.text: And she answered him, Nay, my brother, do not force me; for no such thing ought to be done in Israel: do not thou this folly.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:13
verses.text: And I, whither shall I cause my shame to go? and as for thee, thou shalt be as one of the fools in Israel. Now therefore, I pray thee, speak unto the king; for he will not withhold me from thee.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:14
verses.text: Howbeit he would not hearken unto her voice: but, being stronger than she, forced her, and lay with her.
